tool_description: Segments donor database into targeted groups based on giving history, demographics, engagement patterns, and custom criteria for personalized outreach campaigns.

donor_database_id.description: Unique identifier for the donor database to segment

segmentation_criteria.description: List of criteria for segmentation (e.g., giving_amount, last_donation_date, engagement_score)

min_segment_size.description: Minimum number of donors required per segment

exclude_suppressed.description: Whether to exclude donors who have opted out of communications

error_messages: Database not found: The specified donor_database_id does not exist or is inaccessible.
Invalid segmentation criteria: One or more criteria in segmentation_criteria are not supported or properly formatted.
Insufficient data: The database lacks sufficient donor records or required fields for segmentation.
Segment size too small: All resulting segments are smaller than min_segment_size requirement.
usage: Provide donor_database_id and segmentation_criteria array. Optionally set min_segment_size and exclude_suppressed flag. The tool returns segment definitions and donor counts for each segment.

total_donors_processed.description: Total number of donor records processed

segment_sizes.description: Number of donors in each segment

segmentation_summary.description: Text summary of segmentation results and key insights
